title: Is Shenzhen a clean city? - Quora

response.answer_text: Haha, yes, I love Shenzhen. Shenzhen is a major city in Guangdong Province, China. The air in Shenzhen is much better than in other cities in China. At least, the sky in Shenzhen is blue. The biggest feature of Shenzhen should be: a lot of people. Here I share you some pictures about Shenzhen. 1 a lot of people.  2 Jiaochangwei  3 Shenzhen Software Industrial Base （On the right is the Tencent Building.）  4 Shenzhen Civic Center  5 The sky before the typhoon （in this year ）  Hope you have a chance to visit this beautiful city!
Depends on where you are comparing with. Cities near Shanghai such as those in Jiangsu and Zhejiang are obviously cleaner than Shenzhen. Cities in South Korea and Japan also.
